node.title: Best Overall (Shareable + Importable): SVG + Design Tokens (JSON)
node.comment: Produce an .svg mock (screens/controls) plus a tokens.json (colors, typography, spacing, radii). Pros: pixel_precise, scalable, editable, diff_friendly, imports into Figma/Sketch, easy to theme via tokens. Cons: no component semantics unless annotated (ids/classes).

node.title: Dev_First Hi_Fi: React + Tailwind (or HTML + CSS)
node.comment: Generate interactive layouts in React (or static HTML). Pros: runs in browser, easy stakeholder review, fast iteration, direct handoff to engineers, supports Storybook. Cons: design tools don_t round_trip perfectly; requires basic web hosting to preview.

node.title: macOS_Native Preview: SwiftUI View (Xcode Previews)
node.comment: Emit SwiftUI code for windows, sidebars, toolbars, lists, forms. Pros: instant native preview, realistic platform widgets, great for a MacWhisper_like app. Cons: designers outside Xcode can_t edit; visual tweaks require dev help.

node.title: Design_Tool Generation: Figma Plugin/Widget Script
node.comment: Output a small Figma Plugin/Widget (TS/JS) that constructs frames, auto_layout, and components using tokens. Pros: lands directly in Figma for designers; maintains constraints. Cons: needs Figma runtime to execute; slightly higher setup cost.

node.title: Fastest Visual Only: PNG/JPEG (or PDF)
node.comment: High_fidelity images for quick reviews. Pros: trivial to share. Cons: not editable, no layers, poor handoff to build.

node.title: Stakeholder Review (today)
node.comment: SVG + PNG preview; attach tokens.json for theming.

node.title: Designer Iteration (Figma_centric)
node.comment: Figma plugin/script + tokens.json; optionally import SVGs as starting points.

node.title: Engineer Handoff (build next sprint)
node.comment: React + Tailwind (or SwiftUI for macOS) with shared tokens; add Storybook for components.

node.title: Public Concept Teaser
node.comment: PNG/PDF exported from the React/SwiftUI render for consistency.

node.title: SVG
node.comment: One file per screen; group layers with ids; include aria_labels; reference tokens via data_ attributes.

node.title: Tokens JSON
node.comment: Style Dictionary schema: color.brand.primary, font.size.sm, space.4, radius.md, shadow.lg, etc.

node.title: React/HTML
node.comment: Componentized layout, Tailwind classes only (no custom CSS), responsive container, aria roles; optional Storybook CSF stories.

node.title: SwiftUI
node.comment: Single file per screen with PreviewProvider; uses @Environment(.colorScheme); constants pulled from tokens.

node.title: Figma Plugin
node.comment: TS file that reads tokens.json, creates Frame nodes with AutoLayout, Text styles, Color styles, ComponentSets for controls.

node.title: Quick Recommendation (for your project)
node.comment: Use SwiftUI for macOS previews + tokens.json for theme, and export parallel React + Tailwind for web/shareable demos. Provide SVG snapshots for Figma import when needed.
